Returns: The maximum allowed volume where this session is playing.
getMaxVolume().Description: Gets the maximum volume that may be set for this session.

Returns: The stream this session is playing on.
getAudioStream().Description: Use @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaControllerCompat#PlaybackInfo#getAudioAttributes_E@ instead. Gets the stream this is currently controlling volume on. When the volume type is @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaControllerCompat#PlaybackInfo#PLAYBACK_TYPE_REMOTE_E@ this value does not have meaning and should be ignored.

Returns: The type of volume handling this session is using.
getPlaybackType().Description: Gets the type of volume handling, either local or remote. One of: @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaControllerCompat#PlaybackInfo#PLAYBACK_TYPE_LOCAL_E@ @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaControllerCompat#PlaybackInfo#PLAYBACK_TYPE_REMOTE_E@

Returns: The type of volume control that may be used with this session.
getVolumeControl().Description: Gets the type of volume control that can be used. One of: @B_androidx#media#VolumeProviderCompat#VOLUME_CONTROL_ABSOLUTE_E@ @B_androidx#media#VolumeProviderCompat#VOLUME_CONTROL_RELATIVE_E@ @B_androidx#media#VolumeProviderCompat#VOLUME_CONTROL_FIXED_E@

Returns: The current volume where this session is playing.
getCurrentVolume().Description: Gets the current volume for this session.

ClassDesc: Holds information about the way volume is handled for this session.
